name: Hungry Hungry Sharks
description:
You're stranded at sea and surrounded by sharks. Spin to keep your limbs away from their hungry hungry mouths. The sharks won't bite the life preserver, use it to keep them away!

Made in one month as a learning project.

Controls:
  • D/Right Arrow/Right Mouse Button to spin clockwise
  • A/Left Arrow/Left Mouse Button to spin counter clockwise
Assets Used:

All assets and code created by me unless listed below.

Art:
Shark modified from Shark Sprites - animated 4-directional by Sevarihk licensed CC-BY 4.0: https://opengameart.org/content/shark-sprites-animated-4-directional

Frisbeat by Blue Wave Theory licensed CC-BY-SA 4.0: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Blue_Wave_Theory/Superstorm/frisbeat/
Ooolin Poolin Oy by Blue Wave Theory licensed CC-BY-SA 4.0: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Blue_Wave_Theory/Blue_Wave_Theory/ooolin-poolin-oy/

Sound Effects:
